items.Justification: While this paper discusses high-Q micro-resonators, it is focused on single-atom Cavity-QED rather than free-space optical communication or adaptive optics.
This paper is about non-linear low symmetry photonic crystal structures, which might be tangentially relevant to FSOC but does not directly address atmospheric turbulence or adaptive optics.
This paper is about a spin-of-light gyroscope and does not directly relate to optical communication, adaptive optics, or atmospheric turbulence.
This paper focuses on molecular dynamics and does not relate to free-space optical communication or adaptive optics.
This paper discusses gauge-invariant optical selection rules for excitons, which is not directly relevant to FSOC, adaptive optics, or atmospheric turbulence.
